mapper.insert: insert into tblTeamBoard (boardseq, senduserseq, receiveuserseq, boardtitle, boardcontent, ofilename, filename, delyn, regdate) values (TeamBoard_seq.nextVal, 1, 4, #{boardtitle}, #{boardcontent}, #{ofilename}, #{filename}, default, default)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tblteamboard t INNER JOIN tbluserinfo i ON t.senduserseq = i.seq WHERE i.name = '테스터1' order by t.boardseq desc
